summary.purpose: Implements a singleton structured logger that prefixes all output with ISO timestamps and supports log, error, warn, and table output.
summary.problem_solved: Provides a consistent, timestamped logging interface across all microservices, replacing raw console calls with a structured logger that can be easily extended.

exports.name: LoggerManager
exports.description_one_line: Singleton class providing structured, timestamped console logging.

exports.name: logger
exports.description_one_line: The singleton LoggerManager instance for use throughout the application.

symbols.name: LoggerManager
symbols.description_one_line: Singleton class providing structured, timestamped console logging.

details.what_it_does: Wraps console.log, console.error, console.warn, and console.table with ISO timestamp prefixes. All methods accept a message string and an optional data argument.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs a message with timestamp using console.log.

methods.name: error
methods.description: Logs an error with timestamp using console.error.

methods.name: warn
methods.description: Logs a warning with timestamp using console.warn.

methods.name: table
methods.description: Logs tabular data with timestamp using console.table.

extensive_correct.title: Log an error with data

symbols.name: logger
symbols.description_one_line: The singleton LoggerManager instance for use throughout the application.

details.what_it_does: Creates and exports the singleton LoggerManager instance. Import this directly instead of creating new LoggerManager instances.
